alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 5:58PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Crawford and southwestern Washington Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles southwest of Winslow, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Natural Dam... Winslow... Chester... Devils Den State Park... Lake Fort Smith... Strickler... Blackburn... Lee Creek... Brentwood... Locke... Odell... Mount Gayler... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 32 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
